about_desc: We are leaders in the field of financing offer comparison and help our clients find the best financial solution for them.

cookie: This website uses cookies to improve your experience. Continuing to browse constitutes consent to the use of cookies.
cookie_learn_more: Learn more about using Cookie files.
cookie_message: Our website processes Cookies to improve services. By staying on the site, you agree to the use of Cookie files.
cookie_policy_analytics_text:
These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously:

• Counting visitors and traffic sources
• Identifying the most popular pages
• Analyzing browsing patterns to improve the site

Providers: Google Analytics, Hotjar, Facebook Pixel
Duration: Up to 26 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_consent_text:
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and electronic privacy laws, we are required to obtain your explicit consent for the use of non-essential cookies.

Valid consent must be:
• Given freely without pressure
• Specific to each type of cookie
• Based on complete and understandable information
• Easily revocable

You can give consent using the selection buttons in the cookie banner that appears on your first visit to the site.
cookie_policy_contact_text:
For questions regarding the cookie policy or requests related to your personal data:

Email: privacy@banktlmonline.com
Phone: 03-1234567
Address: Bankers Street 15, Tel Aviv 6812345
Data Protection Officer (DPO): dpo@bankimonline.com

For requests to delete data, corrections, or to receive a copy of the information we hold about you, please contact us using the above methods. We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days.
cookie_policy_essential_text:
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website. Without these cookies, some services on the site will not work properly. Essential cookies include:

• Security and user identification cookies
• Session cookies for site navigation
• Cookies for saving basic preferences

Duration: Session cookies (deleted when browser is closed) or up to 12 months
Legal basis: Legitimate interest - essential for website functionality
cookie_policy_functional_text:
These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made and provide enhanced and more personalized features:

• Remembering your preferred website language
• Remembering display settings
• Saving information in mortgage calculators

Duration: Up to 24 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_intro: This website belongs to and is managed by Bankimonline Ltd. ("Bankimonline"). Bankimonline may update this notice at any time and publish changes on this page. You should visit this page periodically to review these updates.
cookie_policy_logging_text:
We keep a record of the consents you have given for 12 months from your last visit to the site, as required by law. The record includes:

• Date and time of consent
• Types of cookies you approved
• Version of cookie policy that was in effect
• IP address (encrypted)
cookie_policy_management_text:
You can manage your cookie preferences in several ways:

Through our website settings:
• Click on "Cookie Settings" at the bottom of the page
• Choose the types of cookies you wish to approve
• Save your settings

Through your browser settings:
Chrome: Click three dots (⋮) → Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
Firefox: Click three lines (☰) → Settings → Privacy and security
Safari: Safari menu → Preferences → Privacy
Edge: Three dots (...) → Settings → Privacy, search and services
cookie_policy_marketing_text:
These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to you and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns:

• Displaying personalized advertisements
• Preventing the same advertisement from being shown multiple times
• Measuring advertising effectiveness

Providers: Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, other advertising companies
Duration: Up to 24 months
Legal basis: Consent
cookie_policy_mobile_text:
In mobile applications or when browsing on mobile devices, you can manage tracking settings:

iOS (iPhone/iPad):
Settings → Privacy & Security → Tracking → App Tracking Requests

Android:
Settings → Google → Ads → Reset advertising ID
cookie_policy_personal_data_text:
Some cookies may collect data that identifies you personally or in combination with other information. This data includes:

• Unique device identifier
• IP address
• Browsing patterns and site behavior
• General geographic information

Your rights under GDPR:
• Right to access your personal information
• Right to correct incorrect data
• Right to data deletion (right to be forgotten)
• Right to restrict processing
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing
cookie_policy_sharing_text:
We may share information with external service providers for the following purposes:

• Website traffic analysis (Google Analytics)
• Targeted advertising (Google Ads, Facebook)
• User experience improvement (Hotjar)
• Payment and security services

Each external provider is obligated to:
• Meet high data security standards
• Use information only for defined purposes
• Delete information when no longer needed
cookie_policy_updates_text:
We continuously monitor the cookies active on our website and update this policy accordingly. Material changes will require renewed consent.

Last update: July 2025
Version: 2.1
cookie_policy_what_are_text:
Cookie files are small text files stored on your device (computer, mobile phone, or any other device) when you visit websites. Cookies store information about your visit to the site and help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

Cookies are not harmful to your device and do not contain viruses. They serve various purposes such as remembering login details, saving items in shopping carts, displaying relevant advertisements, and analyzing website traffic.
cookie_text:
**Cookie Usage Policy**

This website belongs to and is managed by Bankimonline Ltd. ("Bankimonline"). Bankimonline may update this notice at any time and publish changes on this page. You should visit this page periodically to review these updates.

**What are Cookie Files**

Cookie files are small text files stored on your device (computer, mobile phone, or any other device) when you visit websites. Cookies store information about your visit to the site and help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

Cookies are not harmful to your device and do not contain viruses. They serve various purposes such as remembering login details, saving items in shopping carts, displaying relevant advertisements, and analyzing website traffic.

**Types of Cookies We Use**

**Essential Cookies (Strictly Necessary)**
These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the website. Without these cookies, some services on the site will not work properly. Essential cookies include:
• Security and user identification cookies
• Session cookies for site navigation
• Cookies for saving basic preferences

**Functional Cookies**
These cookies allow the website to remember choices you have made and provide enhanced, more personal features:
• Remembering your preferred site language
• Remembering display settings
• Saving information in mortgage calculators

**Performance and Analytics Cookies**
These cookies help us understand how visitors use the website by collecting information anonymously:
• Counting visitors and traffic sources
• Identifying the most popular pages
• Analyzing browsing patterns to improve the site

**Advertising and Marketing Cookies**
These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements to you and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns:
• Displaying personalized advertisements
• Preventing the same advertisement from being shown multiple times
• Measuring advertising effectiveness

**Your Consent to Cookie Usage**

In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and electronic privacy laws, we are required to obtain your explicit consent for the use of non-essential cookies.

Valid consent must be:
• Given freely without pressure
• Specific to each type of cookie
• Based on complete and understandable information
• Easily revocable

**Managing Cookie Preferences**

You can manage your cookie preferences in several ways:

Through our website settings:
• Click on "Cookie Settings" at the bottom of the page
• Choose the types of cookies you wish to approve
• Save your settings

Through your browser settings:
• Chrome: Click three dots (⋮) → Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
• Firefox: Click three lines (☰) → Settings → Privacy and security
• Safari: Safari menu → Preferences → Privacy
• Edge: Three dots (...) → Settings → Privacy, search and services

**Contact**

For questions regarding the cookie policy or requests related to your personal data:

Email: privacy@bankimonline.com
Phone: 03-1234567
Address: 15 Bankers Street, Tel Aviv 6812345

Last updated: July 2025

privacy_policy_intro: **Bankimonline Privacy Policy**\n\nBankimonline is committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
privacy_policy_section_10_1: **10.1 Restrictions:** We do not transfer personal information outside Israel without explicit consent and appropriate safeguards.
privacy_policy_section_10_2: **10.2 Special Safeguards:** Any international transfer is subject to special protection agreements and legal oversight.
privacy_policy_section_11: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you in advance of any material changes by email or through a notice on the website. Continued use of the website after publication of changes will be considered consent to the updated policy.
privacy_policy_section_12: This privacy policy is effective from January 1, 2025, and will remain in effect until further notice. We review and update the policy at least once a year to ensure it remains current and relevant.
privacy_policy_section_13_1: **13.1 Mediation Attempt:** Any privacy-related dispute will first be handled through mediation and arbitration attempts.
privacy_policy_section_13_2: **13.2 Jurisdiction:** Exclusive jurisdiction for disputes lies with the courts in Tel Aviv.
privacy_policy_section_13_3: **13.3 Applicable Law:** This policy is governed by the laws of the State of Israel.
privacy_policy_section_14_1: **14.1 Sensitive Data:** Health information, religious beliefs, political views, and biometric information are considered sensitive data requiring enhanced protection.
privacy_policy_section_14_2: **14.2 Automated Processing:** Any automated decision significantly affecting you will allow for human intervention and appeal.
privacy_policy_section_15: In case of security breach or suspected breach, we will act immediately to identify the problem, take corrective measures, and notify you and appropriate authorities within 72 hours, in accordance with legal requirements.
privacy_policy_section_16_1: **16.1 Availability:** Our support team is available for any privacy-related questions through the means detailed below.
privacy_policy_section_16_2: **16.2 Specialized Training:** Service representatives have undergone specialized training in privacy protection and individual rights.
privacy_policy_section_17_1: For any questions or requests related to our privacy policy, please contact us:
privacy_policy_section_1_1: **1.1 Personal Information:** We collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily, such as full name, phone number, email address, date of birth, and ID number.
privacy_policy_section_1_2: **1.2 Financial Information:** As part of mortgage or credit applications, we may collect information about your financial situation, including income, expenses, assets, and liabilities.
privacy_policy_section_1_3: **1.3 Technical Information:** We automatically collect information about your use of the website, including IP address, browser type, operating system, and pages visited.
privacy_policy_section_1_4: **1.4 Cookies:** We use cookies and similar technologies to improve website experience and for analytical purposes.
privacy_policy_section_1_5: **1.5 Information from External Sources:** We may receive information about you from partner banks, credit reporting agencies, and other entities as part of credit risk assessment.
privacy_policy_section_2_1: **2.1 Service Purpose:** We use your information to provide mortgage and credit comparison services, process your applications, and present suitable offers from partner banks.
privacy_policy_section_2_2: **2.2 Service Improvement:** We use information to improve our website and services, develop new products, and conduct statistical research.
privacy_policy_section_2_2_1: **2.2.1** User behavior analysis to improve website experience
privacy_policy_section_2_2_2: **2.2.2** Development of new mortgage and credit calculation tools
privacy_policy_section_2_2_3: **2.2.3** Market research to understand customer needs
privacy_policy_section_2_2_4: **2.2.4** Optimization of application and approval processes
privacy_policy_section_2_2_5: **2.2.5** Creation of statistical reports without personal identification
privacy_policy_section_3_1: **3.1 Partner Banks:** We may share your information with partner banks to obtain mortgage or credit offers, only after receiving your explicit consent.
privacy_policy_section_3_10: **3.10 Opt-out Request:** You may request not to share your information with specific banks or entities.
privacy_policy_section_3_11: **3.11 Sharing Notification:** We commit to informing you of any information sharing that occurs.
privacy_policy_section_3_12: **3.12 Withdrawal Right:** You may withdraw consent for information sharing at any time.
privacy_policy_section_3_2: **3.2 Service Providers:** We may share information with external service providers who assist us in operating the website and providing services, such as data storage providers, payment services, and market research companies.
privacy_policy_section_3_3: **3.3 Legal Requirements:** We may disclose personal information when required by law or court order, or to protect our rights, property, or user safety.
privacy_policy_section_3_4: **3.4 Mergers and Acquisitions:** In case of merger, acquisition, or asset sale, personal information may be transferred to the acquiring party as part of the transaction.
privacy_policy_section_3_5: **3.5 Explicit Consent:** Any sharing of sensitive information will only occur after obtaining explicit and prior consent from you.
privacy_policy_section_3_6: **3.6 Anonymization:** When we share information for research or statistical purposes, we ensure the information cannot be personally identified.
privacy_policy_section_3_7: **3.7 Geographic Boundaries:** We do not transfer personal information outside Israel's borders without explicit consent.
privacy_policy_section_3_8: **3.8 Audit and Control:** Every external service provider undergoes strict approval processes and signs stringent confidentiality agreements.
privacy_policy_section_3_9: **3.9 Time Limitation:** Information sharing is limited to the period required for the specific purpose only.
privacy_policy_section_4_1: **4.1 Encryption:** We use advanced encryption technologies (SSL/TLS) to protect your information during transmission over the internet.
privacy_policy_section_4_2: **4.2 Limited Access:** Access to your personal information is limited to authorized employees who need the information to perform their duties.
privacy_policy_section_4_3: **4.3 Backup and Recovery:** We perform regular data backups and maintain emergency recovery plans.
privacy_policy_section_4_4: **4.4 Security Updates:** We regularly update our security systems to address new threats.
privacy_policy_section_4_5: **4.5 Security Audits:** We conduct periodic security audits by professional external parties.
privacy_policy_section_5_1: **5.1 Right of Access:** You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you.
privacy_policy_section_5_10: **5.10 No Fee:** Exercising your rights is free of charge, except in cases of multiple or unreasonable requests.
privacy_policy_section_5_11: **5.11 Identity Verification:** We may request identity verification before exercising your rights.
privacy_policy_section_5_12: **5.12 Request Documentation:** Every request is documented and handled professionally.
privacy_policy_section_5_13: **5.13 Legal Counsel:** You have the right to receive legal counsel on privacy matters.
privacy_policy_section_5_14: **5.14 Status Updates:** We will update you on the progress of handling your request.
privacy_policy_section_5_15: **5.15 Communication Retention:** All communication regarding your rights will be retained for 7 years.
privacy_policy_section_5_2: **5.2 Right of Correction:** You have the right to request correction or updating of incorrect or inaccurate information.
privacy_policy_section_5_3: **5.3 Right of Deletion:** You have the right to request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal limitations.
privacy_policy_section_5_4: **5.4 Right of Restriction:** You have the right to request limitation of use of your information for certain purposes.
privacy_policy_section_5_5: **5.5 Right of Portability:** You have the right to receive a copy of your information in a structured, transferable format.
privacy_policy_section_5_6: **5.6 Right of Objection:** You have the right to object to processing your information for direct marketing purposes.
privacy_policy_section_5_7: **5.7 Consent Withdrawal:** You have the right to withdraw previously given consent for information processing.
privacy_policy_section_5_8: **5.8 Complaint:** You have the right to file a complaint with the Privacy Protection Authority in case of privacy violation.
privacy_policy_section_5_9: **5.9 Quick Response:** We commit to responding to your requests within 30 days.
privacy_policy_section_6_1: **6.1 Cookie Types:** We use essential cookies, performance cookies, and marketing cookies to improve website experience.
privacy_policy_section_6_2: **6.2 Cookie Management:** You can manage and block cookies through your browser settings or through the cookie panel on our website.
privacy_policy_section_7_1: **7.1 Retention Period:** We retain your personal information for 7 years from service completion, or until you request its deletion.
privacy_policy_section_7_10: **7.10 Early Notifications:** We will notify you in advance of planned deletion of your information.
privacy_policy_section_7_11: **7.11 Partial Retention:** In some cases, we retain part of the information for anonymous statistical purposes.
privacy_policy_section_7_12: **7.12 Emergency Recovery:** We maintain emergency recovery capability for a limited period.
privacy_policy_section_7_2: **7.2 Legal Retention:** In certain cases, we are required to retain information for longer periods according to legal requirements.
privacy_policy_section_7_3: **7.3 Automatic Deletion:** Information no longer needed is automatically deleted on predetermined dates.
privacy_policy_section_7_4: **7.4 Secure Archive:** Historical information is kept in specially encrypted and protected archives.
privacy_policy_section_7_5: **7.5 Archive Access:** Access to archived information is limited to a small number of authorized employees.
privacy_policy_section_7_6: **7.6 Periodic Review:** We periodically review the need to retain old information.
privacy_policy_section_7_7: **7.7 Secure Deletion:** All information deletion is performed securely and irreversibly.
privacy_policy_section_7_8: **7.8 Deletion Documentation:** Every deletion operation is documented and audited.
privacy_policy_section_7_9: **7.9 Backups:** Backups are stored separately and deleted according to the established schedule.
privacy_policy_section_8_1: **8.1 Age Restriction:** Our services are intended for ages 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors under 18.
privacy_policy_section_8_2: **8.2 Minor Identification:** If we discover we have collected information from a minor, we will delete it immediately.
privacy_policy_section_8_3: **8.3 Parents and Guardians:** Parents and guardians are welcome to contact us if they suspect their child has used our services.
privacy_policy_section_9_1: **9.1 Privacy Protection Law:** We operate in accordance with the Privacy Protection Law, 1981 and its regulations.
privacy_policy_section_9_2: **9.2 Processing Principles:** Processing your information is based on the following principles:
privacy_policy_section_9_2_1: **9.2.1** Legality, fairness, and transparency in information processing
privacy_policy_section_9_2_13: **9.2.13** Security by design and by default
privacy_policy_section_9_2_2: **9.2.2** Purpose limitation - processing for defined and legitimate purposes only
privacy_policy_section_9_2_3: **9.2.3** Minimization - collecting minimal information required for the purpose
privacy_policy_section_9_2_4: **9.2.4** Accuracy - maintaining correctness and currency of information
privacy_policy_section_9_3: **9.3 Database Registration:** Our database is legally registered in the database registry.
privacy_policy_section_9_4: **9.4 Data Protection Officer:** We have appointed a data protection officer responsible for implementing privacy policy.
privacy_policy_section_9_5: **9.5 Training:** All employees undergo periodic training on privacy protection matters.
privacy_policy_section_9_6: **9.6 External Audits:** We conduct periodic external audits to ensure legal compliance.
privacy_policy_text:
Mortgage Comparison Ltd., P.O. Box 516205713 ("Company") welcomes your choice to view the BANKIM ONLINE website operating at https://bankimonline.com/ ("Website"). BANKIM ONLINE is a website that provides a convenient online platform for mortgage comparison that provides mortgage and credit offers from banks according to data entered by the user ("digital process"), and also the site presents information about mortgage consulting services provided by the company ("services").

1. Website Usage:

1.1. These terms and conditions of use constitute a binding agreement between you, whether privately or through a corporation ("you"), and the website regarding viewing and using the website on any computer or any other communication device such as a mobile phone, tablet computers, etc., and it also applies to the use of the website whether through the Internet or through any other network or means of communication.

1.2. Viewing and/or using the website in any form, including simple browsing, downloading information from the website, sending inquiries through the website, etc., constitutes agreement on your part to all the terms set forth in these terms.

refund_text:
**Refund Conditions**

For the use of our consulting services and conducting an interest rate tender, the amount to be paid is 3,850 New Israeli Shekels including VAT as required by law (hereinafter: "the fee"). Payment is required before the start of service provision, and payment is made for the service provided to you by Bankimonline.

**1.** Upon completion of the tender between the banks, we will notify you of this through one of the contact details you provided to Bankimonline (for example: email, SMS message to mobile phone, etc.), and we will refer you to the relevant bank to complete the mortgage approval process.

**2.** You may try to obtain independently and in an official document from the bank a better offer than the best offer obtained for you, and for this you will be given a period of seven days from the date of receiving the notice of completion of the tender activity.

**3.** For the purposes of the above, "the best offer" means that the total cost of the loan is the lowest among the offers received from all the banks that participated in the tender, taking into account the interest rate, linkage, loan fees, and early repayment fees.

**4.** If you succeed in obtaining a better offer as mentioned above and you provide us with written proof of this within seven days, we will refund the full amount paid to us. A "better offer" is an offer that offers better conditions in terms of total loan cost than what we obtained for you through the tender.

**5.** If you do not provide us with written proof of a better offer within seven days as mentioned above, we will not refund the amount paid.

**6.** The refund, if relevant, will be made to the same payment method used for the original payment, within 14 business days of receiving the written proof of the better offer.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions regarding refunds: info@bankimonline.com
Phone: +972 04-623-2280

**This refund policy is effective from the date of service provision and is subject to the terms of service and privacy policy of Bankimonline.**

terms_text:
Welcome to the BANKIM ONLINE website. Use of the site is conditioned upon your agreement to the following terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the site.

1. Definitions:

"Company" - Mortgage Comparison Ltd., reg. No. 516205713
"Website" - BANKIM ONLINE website operating at https://bankimonline.com/
"Users" - all visitors and users of the website
"Services" - all services provided on the website

2. About the Service:

The website provides a digital platform for comparing mortgage and credit offers from various banks in Israel. The service is intended to provide information and assessments for orientation purposes only and does not constitute professional financial advice.

3. Website Usage:

3.1 Use of the website is permitted for lawful purposes only
3.2 It is prohibited to copy, distribute, or make commercial use of the website content without prior written permission
3.3 It is prohibited to present false or misleading information on the website
3.4 It is prohibited to interfere with the functioning of the website or its technical components

4. Liability and Limitations:

4.1 Information on the website is presented as is, without warranty of its accuracy or completeness
4.2 The company is not responsible for damages that may result from use of the website
4.3 The offers presented are subject to bank approval and may change

5. Privacy and Data Security:

5.1 The company undertakes to maintain user privacy in accordance with the privacy policy
5.2 The collected information will be used to provide the services offered on the website
5.3 The company will take reasonable security measures to protect the information

6. Intellectual Property Rights:

All rights to the website and its content belong to the company or authorized third parties. Use of the website does not grant users any intellectual property rights.

7. Changes to Terms:

The company may update the terms of use from time to time. Continued use of the website after publication of changes constitutes agreement to the updated terms.

8. Applicable Law:

These terms of use are subject to the laws of the State of Israel. Any disputes will be heard in the competent courts of Israel.

For additional questions, please contact us:
Email: info@bankimonline.com
Phone: 03-1234567

Last update: July 2025
